Section.Catchline: Procurement of cadaveric organs for transplant by out-of-state physicians.

SectionBody.Text: Any physician currently licensed to practice medicine and surgery in the United States may surgically procure in this state cadaveric organs for transplant if:

Subsection.Text: The organs are being procured for an out-of-state patient who is listed on, or referred through, the United Network for Organ Sharing System; and
The organs are being procured through the auspices of an organ procurement organization certified in this state.
